info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 7:09PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...LOCALLY HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT EASTERN RALEIGH AND SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 657 PM EDT, locally heavy snow showers across the region were slowly moving to the southeast. Locations impacted include... Beckley, Mount Hope, Mabscott, Sophia, Crab Orchard, Dry Creek, Macarthur, Bradley, Shady Spring, Prosperity, Beaver, Daniels, Piney View, Stanaford, Coal City, Powellton, Pax and Ghent. This includes the following highways... West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 28 and 67. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 120 and 137. Route 19 between mile markers 1 and 8. Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter of a mile in some of these snow showers. Use extra caution if you are traveling into or through these snow showers, particuarly if on the interstate. Rapid changes in visibility are likely, along with potentially slick roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
